title: emacs: M-x gofmt with file ending in "}" without newline fails
body:
Make a buffer in emacs, ending in a closing brace, without a trailing newline.

Run M-x gofmt.

gofmt buffer says:

diff <standard input> gofmt/<standard input>
--- /home/bradfitz/toiletwaffle.go      2012-11-09 00:20:59.596470604 -0800
+++ /tmp/gofmt864654113 2012-11-09 00:20:59.596470604 -0800
@@ -49,4 +49,4 @@
                }
	}

-}
\ No newline at end of file
+}

Mini-buffer says: Try to auto-fix word-wrap damage? (y or n) 


If you add the trailing newline, it works fine.
